edu.calstatela.sawooope.entity

Class BoardObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.calstatela.sawooope.entity.BoardObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BoardObjectIDS
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Barricade, Creature, Plant, Tunnel

    public abstract class BoardObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements BoardObjectIDS
    BoardObject is any entity that will be drawn on the TileMap and can interact with other entities drawn on the TileMap. Every Board Object has a position that keeps track of its location on the map.
    Author:
    Benji

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface edu.calstatela.sawooope.entity.BoardObjectIDS

        BARRICADE, GRASS, SHEEP, SHEEP_DECOY, TREE, TUNNEL, WOLF

    • Method Detail

      • setMapPosition

        public static void setMapPosition()
        sets the mapx and mapy to the TileMaps x, y coordinates. This method MUST be called before any entity is drawn

      • setLevel

        public static void setLevel(Level lev)
        Sets the level so that all entities can reference the current level
        Parameters:
        lev - current level

      • draw

        public abstract void draw(Canvas g)
        Draws the entity
        Parameters:
        g - canvas to draw on

      • isPressed

        Checks to see if the entity was pressed
        Parameters:
        pos - position
        Returns:
        true if positions are equal

      • isPressed

        public boolean isPressed(LevelInputProcessor.TouchPosition pos)
        Checks to see if the entity was pressed
        Parameters:
        pos - touch position
        Returns:
        true if the entity is within the touch radius

      • getX

        public double getX()
        Returns:
        the x position on the map

        public boolean isOfType(int id)
        Checks the identity of this entity
        Parameters:
